title.rendered: “Been looking for online marketing concepts as an E-commerce Manager for the company and   learned a lot while training” – Hariharan

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Hariharan, an E-commerce Manager at VLCC at the time he joined dCDMC training at Digiperform. It’s been more than 4 months since he had completed his training with us and has co-developed an E-commerce platform, RoohWorld.com. In a chit-chat session, he shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped him to digitize his e-commerce business as per the online marketing trends.     Have a look!

Digiperform: Hi Hariharan! It’s a pleasure to get connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you & your earlier experiences.

Hariharan: Hello Everyone, I am Hariharan and a Digiperform Alumnus and currently working as an E-commerce Manager at VLCC. I have been associated with online sales and marketing in my previous ventures and jobs too. I have co-developed an e-commerce platform too which is www.roohworld.com.

Digiperform: What exactly/originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Hariharan: I have been associated with E-commerce and its marketing channel since long where I have felt a strong need to digitize my businesses as per the market trends and requirements. As the competition in the market is exceeding every single day and consumers are getting more digitally active; one needs to come on digital platforms to beat the competition and business survival.

Digiperform:  Why did you choose Digiperform over others?

Hariharan: I was looking for an institute which can help me with the online marketing concepts that can help in my ongoing E-commerce business. Also, I wanted to learn cost-effective measures to promote it on various online platforms. Once I took a demo, I felt confident that the content I was looking for was commendable and the trainers here were meeting my expectations.

Digiperform: What is the one thing that makes us stand out from the competition?

Hariharan: The trainers and the LMS.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you have had, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Hariharan: As a student, I loved everything about Digiperform. We really had lively classes with fun activities. We had practical sessions which made our learning much easier.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Hariharan: Yes, I consider Digiperform as a trusted and reliable resource for Digital Marketing. As a matter of fact, I have already referred two of my friends here as well.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Hariharan: 10/10, Nothing less on that scale.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Hariharan: I am pretty good at my job at the moment, however, I wish to work on my Ecommerce platform and become a digital entrepreneur.

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what it be?

Hariharan: Hard work is the key! Learn here, Practice everywhere.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Hariharan: The best needs no description, the name is enough. Thanks a lot, Hariharan for sharing your experience with us and being the part of Digiperform family. We wish you a great success in your future.
